thread.section_title: Tractive Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Tractive | tractive.com
thread.title: Simon Armstrong

author: Simon Armstrong
title: Simon Armstrong
text: Only had my 2 trackers for around 3 weeks but they're working perfectly on 2 young and extremely active labradors! We live in a very rural area in the French Pyrennes and the GPS coverage is excellent which makes live tracking a cinch. The mobile app is clear and easy to use - no issues whatsoever. I needed to contact support on one occasion and the response was quick and efficient. Highly recommended solution for hassle free pet tracking!
